full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Cancelled-W8486-228589/A**
==============================================

Government of Canada - Department of National Defence
---------------------------------------------------

### Tender Announcement Details

| Field | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | W8486-228589/A | Refers to the tender solicitation number. |
| Tender Status | Cancelled | The tender is no longer active. |
| Original Publication Date | 2022-11-01 | Date when the tender was initially published. |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-01-03T14:00:00 | Date and time when submissions were due. |

### Technical Requirements

The purpose of this tender was to acquire various goods and services under the following categories:

* Engine Accessories, Miscellaneous, Non-Aircraft (GSIN: N2990, N5975, N9515)
* Electrical Hardware and Supplies (GSIN: N9515)
* Plate, Sheet, Strip, Foil and Leaf (GSIN: N9515)

### Geographical Applicability

The tender was applicable to the following regions:

* Alberta
* Quebec (except the National Capital Region)

### Additional Information

This tender was part of the government's procurement activities under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and was open to worldwide submissions. The solicitation was conducted by the Department of National Defence, with submissions due on 2023-01-03 by 14:00:00.

### Contact Information

 Deborah Moldowan
Deputy Director, Acquisitions Branch
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
Telephone: 819-939-0832
Email: deborah.moldowan@forces.gc.ca

Due to the cancellation, no further information or documentation is provided. This notice remains available for informational purposes only.
